name: Weasel Real Estate
description:
Welcome to Weasel Real Estate, here we offer fine premium homes to new home buyers.  You've been hired to show these new home buyers a nice house in the suburbs. 

Unfortunately,  upon arrival, you receive some unexpected company. . . From some pesky moles trying to make holes in the lawn! Do what you can to stop them from making holes and quick!

Key Features:

  • Multiple Levels
  • Achievements
  • Raving Weasels

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Weasel Real Estate was created for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1. So if you enjoyed our game that we worked really hard on, please give us a vote ♥

Special thanks to these amazing people that helped make this game!

  • RetroGeek46
  • John Tomblin
  • Denver Pettipas
  • Ywj
  • Bawfer
  • Mr Tree
